original_text:
You have also turned back the edge of his sword,
    and you have not made him stand in battle.
korean_text: 그의 칼날은 둔하게 하사 그가 전장에서 더 이상 버티지 못하게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: You have also turned back the edge of his sword
and you have not made him stand in battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 전투에서 그가 서지 못하게 하셨습니다
